name: The World is Black and White
name_original: The World is Black and White
description:
Platforming game made for the 2020 LEAP-DAY Make-a-Level Game Jam.

Instructions:
Move Left: D or Left Arrow Key
Move Right: D or Right Arrow Key
Jump: W, Up Arrow Key,  or Space

Credits (All CC-BY-3.0):
Fonts: Apostrophic Labs, Typodermic Fonts
Sound Effects: Aurelon, ProjectsU012
Music: Matthew Pablo
